name: River Panel
description:
Architectural decorative superior carved MDF panels. Available in sequential patterns that create a continuous design.

Features: 
- Made from superior MDF 
- White melamine-covered back insures great stability 
- Modern designs 
- Sequential patterns

Dimensions:

Height - 96 inches (2.438 m) 
Thickness - 5/8 Inch (15.875 mm) 
Sequential to - 48" and 96" 
Width - 48 inches (1.219 m) 
Material - Superior Plus MDF 
Packaging format - Sheet

Panels are sold unfinished.

Special Order options: 
- Thermoplastic-covered panel 
- Fireproof panel 
- Moisture-resistant panel

Production Time - 3 to 4 weeks

name: 1-Part Clear Dry Erase Paint
description:
(50 Square Foot Kit) 

Key Selling Points:

1)  Competitive Pricing
2)  Cures in only 3 Days (No conditioning cream needed)
3)  UV Resistant
4)  Anti-Graffiti 

Writing on the walls used to get you in trouble. Well now it’s not only allowed, it’s encouraged! Turn any color wall into a whiteboard surface with our 1-Part Clear Dry Erase Paint. 

The transparent finish allows you to preserve or create any color background you want! Be sure to transform previously unused wall space into a creative, reusable dry erase canvas with our 1-Part Clear Dry Erase Paint.


MAKE AN OLD WHITEBOARD NEW AGAIN
THE LATEST GRAFFITI DETERRENT
10 YEAR WARRANTY

name: Low Odor 0 VOC Clear Dry Erase Paint
description:
(50 Square Foot Kit)

Key Selling Points:

1) Competitive Pricing
2) Cures in only 3 Days (No conditioning cream needed) 
3) 0 VOC's

Bring any color wall to life by turning it into your own personal dry erase canvas with our amazing 2-Part Low Odor Clear Dry Erase Paint. Transform previously unused wall space into a creative, reusable visual surface without changing your room’s color palette. 

This low VOC product is intended for use on walls not directly exposed to sunlight. So let your imagination run wild across an expansive landscape of dry erase!

LIMITLESS COLOR SPECTRUM
0 VOC ECO-FRIENDLY
REQUIRES JUST 1 COAT
WRITE ON IN 3 DAYS
CUSTOMIZE HOW YOU VISUALIZE
10 YEAR WARRANTY

name: Low Odor 0 VOC White Dry Erase Paint
description:
(50 Square Foot Kit)

Key Selling Points:

1) Dare to compare! Only $2.99 per Square Foot 
2) Cures in only 3 Days (No conditioning cream needed) 
3) UV Resistant

Transform your walls into a totally functional dry erase canvas! So go ahead, let your imagination run wild. With our 2-Part Low Odor White Dry Erase Paint drawing on the walls is not only allowed, it's encouraged. We’re breaking that age old drawing on walls taboo. Organize, brainstorm, design, and theorize, get it all done and more like you never have before!



PERFECT FOR REFURBISHING OLD WHITEBOARDS
SINGLE COAT APPLICATION
WRITE ON IN 3 DAYS
0 VOC & ECO-FRIENDLY
10 YEAR WARRANTY

name: Low Odor Black Dry Erase Paint
description:
(50 Square Foot Kit)

Key Selling Points:

1) Competitive Pricing
2) Cures in only 3 Days (No conditioning cream needed) 


It’s time to step into the dark. Fortune favors the bold, and so does our newest paint. Transform previously unused wall space into a dry erase blackboard with our new 2-Part Low Odor Black Dry Erase Paint. It’s now, it’s cool, and it’s perfect for restaurant foyers, club bathrooms or any place you want to display your hip cred. 

Neon and White markers make for a vivid collage of color that effortlessly captivates (Note: markers sold separately). So set yourself apart from the status quo and bring your walls to life like never before.


REFURBISH OLD BLACKBOARDS
1 COAT APPLICATION
WRITE ON IN 3 DAYS
LOW-VOC & ECO-FRIENDLY
MODERNIZE THAT MENU
10 YEAR WARRANTY

name: Matte Self-Adhesive Dry-Erase Board
description:
(Available up to 100 continuous feet! Contact us for custom sizes)

Our ultra-versatile flat finish Whiteyboard Matte kills two birds with one stone. A dry-erase board doing double duty as projector screen, we’ve eliminated the gloss so you can be the boss. Great for the conference room, classroom, or even the family room on movie night.


- BUNDLE YOUR PROJECTOR & DRY-ERASE BOARD
- NO GLARE WHEN PROJECTING ON IT
- WRITE & ERASE OVER IMAGES
- ERASES EFFORTLESSLY

name: Transparent Self Adhesive Dry-Erase Board
description:
(Available up to 100 continuous feet! Contact us for custom sizes)

Convert virtually any surface into a dry erase board without altering its appearance. Our Transparent sheet sticks easily over painted walls, wallpaper and glass. Goes on clear so you barely know it’s there. Add the ability to write and erase over logos, grids and much more!


- CLEAR ADHESIVE WHITEBOARD
- WRITE ON THE WALL
- PRESERVE ANY EXISTING COLOR
- SUBTLE ELEGANT DESIGN

name: Glossy White Self Adhesive Dry-Erase Board
description:
(Available up to 100 continuous feet!  Contact us for custom sizes)

The sleeker, cheaper alternative to those bulky old dry-erase boards. The specially formulated adhesive makes them a breeze to install on any smooth surface. Just peel, stick and smooth! Ideal for the conference room, classroom, or even brainstorming in the basement.


- GREAT ORGANIZATION TOOL
- INSTALL ON ANY SMOOTH SURFACE
- VERY ECO-FRIENDLY
- VISUALIZE YOUR THOUGHTS

name: Black Self Adhesive Dry-Erase Board
description:
(Available up to 100 continuous feet! Contact us for custom sizes)

Black is the new white! Bring your thoughts to life like never before with our black stick-on Midnight Whiteyboard. Imagine turning any indoor or outdoor surface into portable, erasable blackboard that allows you to list all your vital thoughts, school or business data, and personal communications. 

*Designed for NEON or WHITE markers (Note: markers not included). Beware, people can't help but stop and stare at the coolest product to hit the dry-erase market, since well, the original WhiteyBoard.

- ILLUMINATE THE DARK!
- INSTALL ON ANY SMOOTH SURFACE
- REMOVABLE AND REUSABLE
- MAKE YOUR MENU LOOK MAGICAL

name: 1-Part White Dry Erase Paint
description:
(50 Square Foot Kit)

Key Selling Points:

1) Competitive Pricing
2) Cures in only 3 Days (No conditioning cream needed)
3) UV Resistant
4) Anti-Graffiti


Conventional whiteboards are boring. Better to have an entire wall to write on! Take any space to the next level by turning it into a totally writeable and erasable surface with the 1-Part White Dry Erase Paint. 

Make easy-to-change notes and charts without the size limitation of traditional whiteboards. So you know what to do, ditch the old and get with the new!


SUPERIOR DRY ERASE PERFORMANCE
PERFECT FOR REFURBISHING OLD WHITEBOARDS
ONLY 1 COAT REQUIRED
WRITE ON IN 2 DAYS
IDEAL FOR HOME, SCHOOL OR OFFICE
10 YEAR WARRANTY

name: 1-Part Clear Dry Erase Paint Low VOC
description:
(Available in 50 OR 200 Sqft. kits)

WriteUp1 Dry Erase Paint is single component, just pour and paint no mixing required

Turns any paintable surface into a dry erase canvas

Clear finish over any color to accent your space

Low VOC’s may contribute to LEED Indoor Environmental Quality credit

Create, share, collaborate, your imagination has no boundaries

This Paint Kit Includes:

- Roller frame
- Roller cover
- Installation instructions
- Wet paint sign
- Tray
- Paint can opener

name: Paint Kit - For All Dry Erase Paints
description:
We've assembled everything you'll need to install the dry erase paint. Add this kit to your order to prevent any hassle when trying to find the right material. 

When your order arrives it'll be complete and ready for action! Paint not included.


KIT INCLUDES:

5 SHEETS 9" X 11" SANDPAPER
7" HIGH DENSITY FOAM ROLLER
HIGH GRADE PAINT TRAY
1" X 150' PAINTER'S TAPE
SPRAY CLEANER

name: Thermoplastic Ceiling & Wall Panels
description:
These easy to install, decorated thermoplastic panels are made 3-dimensional by a proprietary process.  

Resistant to impacts, chemicals, abrasion, UV, stains, and fire. 

These products are similar to high pressure laminates in their size and thickness.

Extremely lightweight (1/4 pound per square foot).

Available size: 4' x 8'

sheets come unfinished or contact us for pricing and available colours.
